title: Conqueror
summary: (As battleships are not player obtainable yet, no quote is available for this ship.)
full_text:
Conqueror
(As battleships are not player obtainable yet, no quote is available for this ship.)
Overview
The conqueror is a Kavani battleship of the Mandator Line. it spawns in when a Stronghold contested system has a capital shipyard.
Advantages
As a Mandator line ship, it is predicted that it will have more subsystems then other battleships.
Like all battleships, it is very strong and can deal out lots of damage.
TBA
Disadvantages
Like all battleships, it is quite slow.
As Mandator line ships have a top-heavy turret placement, damage taken can be reduced by getting underneath it.
TBA
